verses.verse: God <WG2316> who at sundry times <WG4181> and <WG2532> in divers manners <WG4187> spake <WG2980> in time past <WG3819> unto the <WG3588> fathers <WG3962> by <WG1722> the <WG3588> prophets, <WG4396>

Hath in <WG1909> these <WG5130> last <WG2078> days <WG2250> spoken <WG2980> unto us <WG2254> by <WG1722> his Son, <WG5207> whom <WG3739> he hath appointed <WG5087> heir <WG2818> of all things, <WG3956> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he made <WG4160> the <WG3588> worlds; <WG165>

Who <WG3739> being <WG5607> the brightness <WG541> of his glory, <WG1391> and <WG2532> the express image <WG5481> of his <WG848> person, <WG5287> and <WG5037> upholding <WG5342> all things <WG3956> by the <WG3588> word <WG4487> of his <WG846> power, <WG1411> when he had by <WG1223> himself <WG1438> purged <WG4160> <WG2512> our <WG2257> sins, <WG266> sat down <WG2523> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the <WG3588> Majesty <WG3172> on <WG1722> high; <WG5308>

Being made <WG1096> so much <WG5118> better <WG2909> than the <WG3588> angels, <WG32> as <WG3745> he hath by inheritance obtained <WG2816> a more excellent <WG1313> name <WG3686> than <WG3844> they. <WG846>

For <WG1063> unto which <WG5101> of the <WG3588> angels <WG32> said <WG2036> he at any time, <WG4218> Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> my <WG3450> son, <WG5207> this day <WG4594> have I <WG1473> begotten <WG1080> thee? <WG4571> And <WG2532> again, <WG3825> I <WG1473> will be <WG2071> to him <WG846> a <WG1519> Father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> he <WG846> shall be <WG2071> to me <WG3427> a <WG1519> Son? <WG5207>

And <WG1161> again, <WG3825> when <WG3752> he bringeth in <WG1521> the <WG3588> first begotten <WG4416> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> world, <WG3625> he saith, <WG3004> And <WG2532> let all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316> worship <WG4352> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> of the angels <WG4314> <WG3588> <WG32> he saith, <WG3004> Who maketh <WG4160> his <WG848> angels <WG32> spirits, <WG4151> and <WG2532> his <WG848> ministers <WG3011> a flame <WG5395> of fire. <WG4442>

But <WG1161> unto <WG4314> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> he saith, Thy <WG4675> throne, <WG2362> O God, <WG2316> is forever and ever: <WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> a scepter <WG4464> of righteousness <WG2118> is the <WG3588> scepter <WG4464> of thy <WG4675> kingdom. <WG932>

Thou hast loved <WG25> righteousness, <WG1343> and <WG2532> hated <WG3404> iniquity; <WG458> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> God, <WG2316> even thy <WG4675> God, <WG2316> hath anointed <WG5548> thee <WG4571> with the oil <WG1637> of gladness <WG20> above <WG3844> thy <WG4675> fellows. <WG3353>

And, <WG2532> Thou, <WG4771> Lord, <WG2962> in <WG2596> the beginning <WG746> hast laid the foundation <WG2311> of the <WG3588> earth; <WG1093> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> heavens <WG3772> are <WG1526> the works <WG2041> of thine <WG4675> hands: <WG5495>
They <WG846> shall perish; <WG622> but <WG1161> thou <WG4771> remainest; <WG1265> and <WG2532> they all <WG3956> shall wax old <WG3822> as <WG5613> doth a garment; <WG2440>

And <WG2532> as <WG5616> a vesture <WG4018> shalt thou fold them up, <WG1667> <WG846> and <WG2532> they shall be changed: <WG236> but <WG1161> thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> the <WG3588> same, <WG846> and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> years <WG2094> shall not <WG3756> fail. <WG1587>

But <WG1161> to <WG4314> which <WG5101> of the <WG3588> angels <WG32> said <WG2046> he at any time, <WG4218> Sit <WG2521> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand, <WG1188> until <WG2193> <WG302> I make <WG5087> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> thy footstool? <WG5286> <WG4675> <WG4228>

Are <WG1526> they not <WG3780> all <WG3956> ministering <WG3010> spirits, <WG4151> sent forth <WG649> to minister <WG1519> <WG1248> for <WG1223> them who shall be <WG3195> heirs <WG2816> of salvation? <WG4991>
